text: Shahram Dabiri Oskuei (, born 1960 in Tabriz, East Azerbaijan) is an Iranian politician, physician, sporting director, professor and former board of directors Iran Football Federation. He founded Dabiri Tabriz FSC in 1998.تاریخچه باشگاه فوتسال دبیری تبریز Dabiri FSC plays in the Iranian Futsal Super League, a professional futsal league competition for clubs located at the highest level of the Iranian futsal league system.Dabiri, champion of Iranian Futsal Super League Dabiri is chairman of the Islamic City Council of Tabriz; he won with 105,157 votes. He is also dean of the faculty and professor of nuclear medicine at the Tabriz University of Medical Sciences. ==References== ==External links== * Page of Dr. Dabiri in Islamic City Council of Tabriz * Dabiri FSC Website Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:People from Tabriz Category:Iranian Azerbaijani academics Category:Iranian Azerbaijani politicians Category:Iranian Azerbaijani physicians Category:Iranian sports executives and administrators Category:Tabriz University of Medical Sciences alumni Category:University of Tehran alumni Category:Tabriz University of Medical Sciences faculty Category:Iranian Shia Muslims Category:Ethnic Azerbaijani Shia Muslims Category:Members of City Council of Tabriz
title: Shahram Dabiri Oskuei
